/* Compiler: Borland Turbo C 2.01 */
/* Computer: Rabbit 286 */
/* Problem: Presti Digitator (PRESTI) */
 
#include <stdio.h>
 
int main()
{
int fall, x;
char a[][20]={"1","0","1","2","9","44","265","1854","14833","133496","1334961","14684570","176214841","2290792932","32071101049","481066515734","7697064251745","130850092279664","2355301661033953","44750731559645106","895014631192902121"};
for(scanf("%d",&fall); fall--; scanf("%d",&x),puts(a[x]));
return 0;
}
